comments:
Detaisl:
Error message pop up when preview image from resource folder

Step:
1.New a report design and add an image.
2.Image dialog pop up and select Image in BIRT Resource folder.
3.Select the image in resource folder.
4.Preview.

Actual result:
Image can be previewed, but pop up some error message about the image.

Error0 : Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )

he designer creates a report design looks like:

<image>
<expression name="uri">7_opeMbVItelWO.jpg</expression>
</image>

The uri must be a valid expression instead of a simple name.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 139355 ***
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 139355 ***

After I select the image, I add "" on image expression, it is OK.
But if I must add "" after I select the image, it is not a good and friendly way.

We have made the decision about this issue.
Any problem, please contact with Webin.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 139355 ***
